step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move.
Focus on making a firm fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together as you push down. Try to keep your elbows closer to your body.
Great job squeezing your shoulder blades! Remember to inhale as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent! As you stretch your arms back overhead, focus on a slow exhale and relaxing your muscles.
Good completion of the first repetition. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead.
Second rep starting. Remember to keep your arms relaxed and fingers open.
Continue to focus on a strong fist and squeezing shoulder blades. Try to minimize elbow movement away from your sides.
Well done on the shoulder blade squeeze! Remember to inhale and engage your muscles fully.
Excellent! Exhale slowly as you return your arms overhead and relax.
Good job completing the second repetition. Ensure your arms are fully extended overhead.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to make a firm fist and squeeze your shoulder blades together during the downward motion. Focus on controlled breathing, inhaling as you tighten and exhaling as you relax and stretch overhead.
